basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer | Vue.js • React • Next.js • Node.js
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with ~3 years' experience delivering web, AI, and automation solutions for EU startups and remote clients. Known for rapid development of production-grade apps including an AI-powered Chrome extension and automation tools. Fast, autonomous, and effective in distributed teams. Fluent in English, Romanian, and Russian.

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Led technical design and feature delivery for a Telegram advertising and user retargeting platform. Enabled campaign automation, analytics, and backend support in a distributed startup team.

Developed intuitive dashboards and UI components with Nuxt 3, Vue 3, and TypeScript.
Built automated Telegram bot system for campaign broadcasting and user retargeting.
Contributed to backend features using Java Spring Boot and Node.js, supporting real-time statistics and workflows.
Administered and optimized remote Linux servers for resilient deployment and CI/CD.

highlights: Developed AdGognition: AI-powered Chrome extension for ad image detection (>90% accuracy) using CNN and OpenAI CLIP.
Built RoboGPT prototype: LLM and robotics bot for hardware proof-of-concept; managed ML integration.

Led frontend engineering; modernized UI and drove quality delivery.

Awarded 1st Place Innovation for Otis automation tool—reduced manual workload for support teams.

Implemented Flask services, model hosting/conversion, and monitoring via TensorBoard.
